text: Lindsay Davenport was the defending champion and successfully defended her title by defeating Silvia Farina Elia 7–5, 7–5 in the final. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==External links== * ITF tournament edition details Bausch & Lomb Championships - Singles Singles
title: 2005 Bausch & Lomb Championships – Singles
